4-7-8 Breathing: Start by breathing in through your nose for 4 counts
Exhale through your mouth for 8 counts

Box Breathing: Breathe in through your nose for 4 counts
Exhale through your mouth for 4 counts

Diaphragmatic Breathing: Lie down or sit in a comfortable position
Place one hand on your stomach and one hand on your chest.
Breathe in through your nose, allowing your stomach to expand as you fill your lungs with air.
Exhale through your mouth, feeling your stomach contract as you empty your lungs.
